'''Bedrock Editor v1.0.2''' is a minor release for [[Bedrock Editor]] released on June 18, 2025.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/247|title=Release 1.0.2 (1.21.100.21)|website=GitHub|date=June 18, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/37453175894669-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-100-21|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.100.21|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 18, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added tooltips for all actions with keybindings in Editor.

== Changes ==
* Updated Editor Scripting Structure Manager to use Editor's structure repository instead of the level's.
* Updated cursor control keybinding to cycle through all cursor control modes.
* Updated brush mask keybinding to cycle through all the brush mask modes.
